objects.name: Analytic 0434
objects.description: Non-standard or rare users/locations issue CLI commands like "show clock detail" or "show timezone"; optionally followed by configuration of time/timezone or NTP sources. AAA/TACACS+ accounting and syslog correlate execution to identity, source IP, and privilege level.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: networkdevice:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: command-exec: CLI commands containing "show clock", "show clock detail", "show timezone" executed by suspicious user/source

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: networkdevice:config
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: config-change: timezone or ntp server configuration change after a time query command

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Only alert on access from outside the NOC/management subnets.
Correlation window between time query and config change.
